attributes.action: Hold a general election after the Conservative party elects a new leader.
attributes.additional_details: There are no post-Brexit plans and it would be undemocratic if a new unelected government were allowed to spend the next four years shaping the UK's new role.
attributes.background: The EU referendum has fundamentally changed the UK's position in the world, in a way that the present Prime Minister neither intended nor foresaw. Before the next government makes any significant decisions it should face the electorate and get approval for its programme.
